title: Add visible Admin Panel button to navigation

requirements.summary: Add a clearly visible 'Admin Panel' button/link in the main navigation header that navigates to the admin route, accessible on both desktop and mobile menus, styled consistently with the maroon/gold theme
acceptanceCriteria: An 'Admin Panel' link/button is visible in the desktop navigation bar
An 'Admin Panel' link/button is visible in the mobile navigation menu
Clicking the button navigates the user to the #/admin route
The button is styled consistently with the existing maroon/gold theme
The button is present without requiring the user to manually type a URL

file_operations.description: Add an 'Admin Panel' navigation link to both desktop and mobile navigation menus. For desktop nav, add a new NavLink component pointing to '#/admin' with text 'Admin Panel' (Hindi: 'प्रशासन पैनल'). For mobile nav, add the same link inside the mobile menu drawer. Style the link consistently with existing nav items using the maroon/gold theme classes (e.g., hover:text-islamic-gold transition-colors). Ensure the link appears in the visible navigation structure without requiring manual URL entry.
